titleStmt.title: Pasquils fooles-cap sent to such (to keepe their weake braines warme) as are not able to conceiue aright of his mad-cap. With Pasquils passion for the worlds waywardnesse. Begun by himselfe, and finished by his friend Morphorius.
Pasquils mad-cap. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: [by R. Bradock] for Thomas Iohnes, dwelling neere Holborne Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Part 2 only. A revised edition of the edition published the same year (STC 3677)--STC.
Reproductions of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
